column1: #Text=DS : Do you think the religion adds an element of beauty or a fearful element to the culture ?
#Text=It really depends on which kind of religion and which kind of place ...
#Text=DS : The kind practiced here , the kind of Christianity found here .
#Text=The extreme within the religion here in the U.S. , that can be a little terrifying , I think .
#Text=But religion can also add a lot of purpose to people , and when they have purpose they can be more balanced and open-minded .
#Text=It 's really entertaining for me to watch a show like that ; it 's really just like Benny Hill and you watch it and ca n't believe it .
#Text=It 's so far away from anything I 've ever known .
#Text=And they talk about Islam being a dangerous religion but you look over here and it 's just the same !
#Text=DS : They just are n't in madrassahs ...
#Text=DS : If you could choose your own death , how would you die ?
#Text=I would just like to go to sleep one night and not wake up .
#Text=I 'm definitely scared of pain and diseases ; I would n't want to wither .
#Text=DS : You would n't want to experience it ?
#Text=It 's because if you are a creative person it 's the fear you can never be creative again .
#Text=I think about it sometimes , where I think about , " One day you are going to die , you are never going to be here again , you 're never going to do this ...

#Text=It 's a crazy feeling , but obviously something draws me to it sometimes to experience to really get into my mind frame and think ,  I 'm really going to die , I 'm never going to be here , I 'm never going to get up again , I 'm really going to die !
